Remove status bar shadow for Android 4.4 and earlier

Status bar should not cast shadow. See

https://www.google.com/design/spec/what-is-material/elevation-shadows.html#elevation-shadows-shadows

Add Toolbar shadow using elevation API

Elevation is supported since Android Lollipop, on previous Android
versions Toolbar will still be flat.

Fix message search (fix #752)

SearchManager.getSearchableInfo() always returning null becase meta-data
for default_searchable was defined outside the Activity block.
I don't know it could have worked all this time, but whatever...

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>

Fix search again (#752)

Seems that pointing to the the SearchActivity with a relative package
doesn't work for the debug flavour because of the package name.
The previous commit doesn't fix this bug, however it's ok because search
should only be initiated from within the main activity.

Ref: https://github.com/android/platform_frameworks_base/blob/kitkat-mr1-release/services/java/com/android/server/search/Searchables.java#L162
